Articles.Content: There are a lot of forum games where people rate things like avatars and signatures. This one has a broader scope, having users rate the entire profile of the poster above them on a scale of 1 to 10 and then giving reasons why you rated it what you did.

hmm you need an example for this to work so i shall provide you with one

7/10

XKCD +1

Location +0.5

Posts +0.5

Description +2

you're mostly on forum games +2

Nice idea for a thread +1

could also be a description but this should do

Let's see...

+2 Nice avatar.

+1 Nice signature, but it's only text.

+1 Your title fits your avatar quite well.

+1 Zomg so many posts.

+1 Your location is a nice reference to a real place.

+1 Because you play forum games regularly.

7/10

+3 animated profile picture

-1 Servant of the Kracken

+3 Admitting your obsession

+3 Confusing username

8/10

Witty username +3

Uses special characters, so harder to type -1

Small image in signature, making it look better without killing my bandwith +2

Link to company +1

Lack of avatar, so can't judge that +/-0

6/10

Interesting name +3

Space Invaders = Boring -3

Small image signature = +1

2 blog entries, 111 posts = +9
